title: Delete GIT branches
content:
Delete local branch

Flags

  • -d - Deletes the branch if it's been pushed to the remote. Will warn and not delete if it has not been pushed.
  • -D - Force delete branch regardless if it's been pushed to the remote.
$ git branch -d <branch_name>
$ git branch -D <branch_name>

Delete remote branch

$ git push <remote_name> --delete <branch_name>
